Class POPConnector

    Handles the connection to the POP server.

    Rafael Steil

    • Method Detail

      • setMailIntegration

        public void setMailIntegration(MailIntegration mailIntegration)
        Parameters:
        mailIntegration - the MailIntegration instance with all the information necessary to connect to the pop server

      • listMessages

        public javax.mail.Message[] listMessages()
        Lists all available messages in the pop server
        Returns:
        Array of Message's

      • openConnection

        public void openConnection()
        Opens a connection to the pop server. The method will try to retrieve the INBOX folder in READ_WRITE mode

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection to the pop server. Before finishing the communication channel, all messages are flaged for deletion.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(boolean deleteAll)
        Closes the connection to the pop server.
        Parameters:
        deleteAll - If true, all messages are flaged for deletion
